long_description: The GoPro HERO3/3+ surfboard mounts offer maximum holding strength, letting you easily and securely attach your HERO3 or HERO 3+ camera to a surfboard, kayak, stand up paddleboard or boat deck. FCS(TM) compatible male plug allows you to mount your HERO3 camera (sold separately) using an FCS center fin socket. Includes 2 surfboard mounts, 2 camera tethers, 2 tether straps, FCS plug and rubber locking plug.
short_description: The GoPro HERO3/3+ surfboard mounts offer maximum holding strength, letting you easily and securely attach your HERO3 or HERO 3+ camera to a surfboard, kayak, stand up paddleboard or boat deck.
